titles.title: Small Business Trade Representation Act of 2009
A bill to amend the Trade Act of 1974 to establish an Assistant United States Trade Representative for Small Business, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

term.name: Office of the U.S. Trade Representative

bill.summary: 12/9/2009--Introduced. Small Business Trade Representation Act of 2009 - Amends the Trade Act of 1974 to establish within the Office of the United States Trade Representative (USTR) the position of Assistant USTR for Small Business to promote the trade interests of small businesses.
